sql-case.value: SELECT o.order_id + 1 * 2 as exp FROM t_order AS o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT o.order_id + 1 * 2 as exp FROM t_order AS o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT DATE(i.creation_date) AS creation_date FROM `t_order_item` AS i ORDER BY DATE(i.creation_date) DESC
SELECT * FROM t_order_item t WHERE t.status REGEXP ? AND t.item_id IN (?, ?)

select t.*,o.item_id as item_id,(case when t.status = 'init' then '已启用' when t.status = 'failed' then '已停用' end) as stateName from t_order t left join t_order_item as o on o.order_id =t.order_id where t.order_id=1000 limit 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? OR ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? || ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? XOR ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? AND ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? AND ? = t_order.order_id OR t_order.status = 'failed' AND ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = ? && ? = t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE NOT (? = t_order.order_id)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ! ( ? = t_order.order_id)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? = t_order.order_id IS FALSE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? = t_order.order_id IS NOT FALSE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status IS NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status <=> t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status >= t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.status > ALL (SELECt status FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT IN (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id IN (?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id SOUNDS LIKE '1%'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT LIKE '1%' ESCAPE '$'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id NOT REGEXP '[123]'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id | ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id & ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id << ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id >> ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id + ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id - ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id * ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id / ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id DIV ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id MOD ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id % ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id ^ ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id + INTERVAL 1 SECOND
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id - INTERVAL 1 SECOND
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE now() < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id collate 'utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci'
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE @@max_connections < order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? + t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ? - t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ~t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE !t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE BINARY t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE t_order.order_id = BINARY ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ROW(?, now()) = (order_id, status)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ?)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE EXISTS (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item WHERE status > ? )
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE {ts ?}
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id ->"$[1]"
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id ->> "$[1]"
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(order_msg -> '$[*].code', 'x', '$')
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE MATCH (order_id) AGAINST (? IN NATURAL LANGUAGE MODE)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE CASE WHEN order_id > ? THEN ? ELSE ? END
SELECT last_name, job_id, salary, department_id FROM employees WHERE NOT (job_id = 'PU_CLERK' AND department_id = 30) ORDER BY last_name
SELECT last_name, department_id FROM employees WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM employees WHERE last_name = 'Lorentz') ORDER BY last_name, department_id
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id NOT IN (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE location_id = 1700) ORDER BY last_name
SELECT 10+20,CASE order_id WHEN 1 THEN '11' ELSE '00' END,1 FROM t_order
select 1 & 1
select 1 | 1
SELECT ABS(1) FROM t_order WHERE ABS(1) > 1 GROUP BY ABS(1) ORDER BY ABS(1)
SELECT A(1) FROM t_order WHERE A(1) = 1 GROUP BY A(order_id) ORDER BY A(order_id)
SELECT A(1) FROM t_order WHERE A(1) = 1
SELECT TIMEDIFF(NOW(), UTC_TIMESTAMP())
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id COLLATE ?
SELECT * FROM cypher('sharding_test_1', $$ CREATE (n) $$) as (a agtype)
SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' FROM DUAL;
